name: Frontend Developer
description:
About Us

Founded 30 years ago, Micromine is a leading provider of next generation technology for the mining sector. Over the years we have steadily grown to become one of the world’s leading mining software companies, with our solutions used at more than 2,000 sites in over 90 countries.

About The Opportunity

Our Russian team, based at our Semenovskaya Square office in Moscow, are currently seeking a Front End Developer to join them. In this role you will work within a global project team to develop our brand new Micromine Nexus solution.

Micromine Nexus is a secure and streamlined enterprise-level file management solution that’s releasing in 2022.

Reporting directly to the Team Leader - Micromine Nexus Development your key responsibilities will include:

  • Interpreting functional requirements into software design.
  • Assisting with user interface design decisions.
  • Writing high-quality, well-documented, maintainable software code.
  • Conducting peer design reviews as part of the code review process.
  • Developing efficient data processing algorithms.
  • Helping develop user-facing technical documentation and API documentation

About You

You will have experience with commercial software development, including an understanding of OO software engineering principles.

Other key skills, experience, and qualifications:

  • A tertiary qualification in Computer Science or a related field.
  • Development experience in the following: HTML, CSS, SCSS, JS, TS, React + Redux.
  • Experience with Git source control system and JIRA environment for issue tracking and agile project development.
  • Familiarity with the concept of Containers and Docker for software development, packaging, and deployment.

What We Offer

A dynamic multinational company, on a high growth trajectory, with the benefits of an established market leading business:

  • A competitive salary commensurate with the market.
  • Opportunities for professional development.
  • Health cover.
  • 4 weeks paid vacation.
  • A great culture and the opportunity to work with cutting edge mining software.
